data.title: Untouched Garhwal

overview.title: Lansdowne (…The Fairytale Hills):
overview.subtitle: Thick oak forests, mesmerizing hills and spellbinding views, there are numerous places to visit in Lansdowne. A quaint hill station which is perched at an elevation of 1700 meters. Trekking the treacherous trails of Lover’s Lane and exploring the vibrant streets of Lansdowne main Market.

overview.title: Khirsu (…Beauty Unexplored):
overview.subtitle: Khirsu, a hill station in pauri Garhwal district with an altitude of 1700 meters. Famous for its scenic background and spectacular 300 Km-wide panoramic view of the Himalayas, including snow-crested Trishul, Nanda Devi, Nandakot and Panchuhuli peaks.

overview.title: Pauri (…A City Where Time Stands Still):
overview.subtitle: The Garhwal Himalayas have always been considered a place where nature seems to have endowed all her innate loveliness. The land of Pauri Garhwal is blessed with splendid view of snow-bound peaks of Himalayas, scenic valleys, surroundings, meandering rivers, dense forest.

data.nightStay: Lansdowne (2 Nights), Khirshu (1 Night), Pauri (1 Night)

description.title: Day 1  Pickup from Delhi Railway Station / Airport (250 Kms : 7Hrs. Travelling to Lansdowne)

subtitles.activities: Start Journey for Lansdowne on the way You can visit Siddhbali Temple at Koatdwar.
Arrival in Lansdowne and enjoy a quick and hassle-free check-in at Hotel.
Evening free to enjoy the Local Market.
Local sightseeing of Lansdowne like Tiffin-Top and Snow View Point, St Mary’s and St John’s, Darwan Singh Sangrahalaya, Officers’ Mess Museum, Bhim Pakora, etc.

description.title: Day 3  Lansdowne to Khirshu (95 Kms : 3Hrs. Travelling to Khirshu)

subtitles.activities: Local Sightseeing of Khirshu like, Ghandiyal Devta, Eco park, etc.

description.title: Day 4   Khirshu to Pauri (22 Kms : 1Hr. Travelling to Pauri)

subtitles.activities: Local Sightseeing of Pauri like, Kandoliya, Chaukhamba Viewpoint, Kyunkaleshwar Mahadev, etc.

description.title: Day 5  Pauri to Delhi  (300 Kms : 8Hrs. Travelling to Delhi)

subtitles.activities: Reaching at home by having Sweet Memoires in mind and lots of love.

importantInfo.title: Note
subtitles: Vehicles are not allowed on the Mall road of Nainital and Mussoorie so you have to travel by foot there.
AC and Music System in Vehicle will not be operated when we are on the Hilly Area.
All the rates are subject to change without prior notice.
All disputes are subject to Haridwar Jurisdiction.
Govt. Taxes (GST)

importantInfo.title: Mode of Payment:
subtitles: Kindly release 25% Payment for the Blocking.
Kindly release total 50% Payment before 30 days of arrival.
Kindly release total 100% Payment before 7 days of arrival.

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy:
subtitles: 10% of the Total Package Cost is Non-Refundable.
25% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation less than 30 days before arrival.
35% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation between 15 to 7 days before arrival.
50% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation between 7 to 2 days before arrival.
100% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation before 48 Hrs. before arrival.
Altering the confirmed plan Not possible.

inclusionAndExclusion.title: Experience Includes:
subtitles: Accommodation at all the places mention in the itinerary.
Meal Plan: MAPAI (Bed with Breakfast and Dinner) based on fixed meals, served in the restaurant.
Transportation around the tour (As mentioned above).
All sightseeing and excursion as per the Itinerary.
All Toll Tax, Parking Includes.

inclusionAndExclusion.title: Tour Cost dose not Includes:
subtitles: Extra Meal, Boating Charges, Ropeway Charge, Entry Fee, Guide Fee etc.
Anything not specifically mentioned in “Experience Include”.
